task_list: Put the books on the desk.
take the phone from the top of the nightstand and place it in the drawer

finetuned.compose 1: Put the books on the desk at any time. Move the laptop to the bed simultaneously.
finetuned.compose 2: Move the laptop to the bed at any time. Put the books on the desk simultaneously.
finetuned.compose 3: Put the books on the desk at any time. After putting the books, move the laptop to the bed.

task_list: Move a pencil from the window sill to the desk.
Move a phone into a drawer.

finetuned.compose 1: Move a pencil from the window sill to the desk at any time. Simultaneously, move a phone into a drawer.
finetuned.compose 2: Move a phone into a drawer at any time. Simultaneously, move a pencil from the window sill to the desk.
finetuned.compose 3: Move a pencil from the window sill to the desk at any time. After moving the pencil, move a phone into a drawer.

take the phone from the top of the nightstand and place it in the drawer

finetuned.compose 1: Move the laptop to the bed at any time. Simultaneously, place a pencil on a desk. After moving the laptop and placing the pencil, take the phone from the top of the nightstand and place it in the drawer.
finetuned.compose 2: Place a pencil on a desk first. Simultaneously, move the laptop to the bed and take the phone from the top of the nightstand and place it in the drawer.
finetuned.compose 3: Move the laptop to the bed at any time. After moving the laptop, place a pencil on a desk. Finally, take the phone from the top of the nightstand and place it in the drawer.

finetuned.compose 3: Move a pencil from the window sill to the desk. Simultaneously, inspect a bowl by lamplight. After completing those, move a phone into a drawer.

finetuned.compose 2: Inspect a bowl by lamplight at any time. Simultaneously, put a phone in the safe next to the bed. After inspecting the bowl and putting the phone in the safe, move a pencil from the window sill to the desk.
finetuned.compose 3: Move a pencil from the window sill to the desk at any time. Simultaneously, put a phone in the safe next to the bed. After moving the pencil and putting the phone in the safe, inspect a bowl by lamplight.
